AraMod:OrbVolley.NAME: Orb Volley
AraMod:OrbVolley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 3 Lightning. Evoke ALL orbs. Channel ALL orbs evoked.

AraMod:PocketKnife.NAME: Pocket Knife
